item.description:
The championship round for the Providence Roller Derby (PRD) season will go down at the Convention Center on Saturday. PRD is a local institution and the finals should make for a fun show. Since it's Saturday, we could always go out somewhere after.

For the uninitiated, Roller Derby is a sport that heavily borrows from a punk/third wave feminist aesthetic. Game play consists of a series of short matchups ("jams") in which both teams designate a scoring player (the "jammer") who scores points by lapping members of the opposing team. The teams attempt to assist their own jammer whilst hindering the opposing jammer — in effect, playing both offense and defense simultaneously. (from wikipedia)

So come on down, take in the championship bouts and possibly head out somewhere after.

Details

What: Providence Roller Derby championship

Where: Rhode Island Convention Center, 1 Sabin Street

When: Saturday, December 1

Doors open at 5. First bout begins at 6 pm. Let's meet a little earlier in the lobby and try and find a group of seats.

Cost: Adult General Admission: $10 in advance, $15 at the door VIP Tickets: $30 in advance, $36 at the door Kids 6-12: $5 in advance

For tickets: http://www.brownpapertickets.com/event/272497
item.how_to_find_us: Look out for us, we should be easy to find
item.name: Providence Roller Derby Championship Season Finale
